body.name: Baby Trend Cover Me 4-in-1 Infant Toddler Convertible Car Seat with Adjustable/Removable Canopy for Sun Protection & 2 Cup Holders, Stormy Gray
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 21 - 23. Order within 12 hrs 55 mins.
features: Bring your child along with your adventure and ensure their safety with the Cover Me 4-in-1 convertible car seat with an adjustable canopy designed to grow with your child
Offers 4 unique modes: rear-facing infant, rear-facing toddler, forward-facing toddler, and belt-positioning booster; Accommodates children 4 to 100 pounds
Innovative height and angle adjustable canopy for complete in-car shade protection; Flip-out side visors for additional protection; Built-in track allows for easy adjustability and removal
Deluxe fabric seat construction with extra padding lets your child ride with comfort in mind; 2 deep cup holders for snacks and drinks for holding your child's favorite juice or a yummy snack
Headrest of this car seat can be easily adjusted using a special feature called a no-rethread harness; Car seat with zero radius recline with a flip foot for dual recline adjustment
body.description: Designed to grow with your child, providing comfort, safety, and convenience every step of the way, the Baby Trend Cover Me 4-in-1 Convertible Car Seat is the ideal solution for your road trips and adventures. This car seat offers an integrated, patented height and adjustable angle UPF 50 plus canopy for comprehensive in-car shade protection. Adjusting and removing is simple because it is incorporated and coupled to a built-in track. While the car is moving and there are several sunspots, flip-out side visors offer additional shade protection for children. Built with premium, deluxe fabric, and materials, this car seat offers extra padding to keep your child comfortable on a long ride. 2 deep cup holders allow children to place their sippy cups and snacks within reach. Equipped with a headrest with a no-rethread harness, the convertible seat offers ultra-convenience for parents when adjusting the headrest position. With the zero radius recline, plus flip foot for dual recline adjustment, parents can easily adjust the seat and recline in the car. It can also hold a child from 4 to 100 pounds with 4 unique modes: rear-facing infant, rear-facing toddler, forward-facing toddler, and belt-positioning booster. You can rest assured that your child will ride in comfort, style, and safety on all your adventures with the Cover Me 4-in-1 Convertible Car Seat from Baby Trend, the excellent choice for parents and kids alike.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Infant rear facing 4-18 lb Toddler rear facing 18-40 lb Forward facing 23-65 lb Belt positioning booster 40-100 lb

Comfort Cabin The Integrated Canopy and Comfort Cabin has an integrated patented height and angle adjustable UPF 50+ canopy for full in-car shade protection. The canopy is integrated and attached on a built-in track so it's easy to adjust and remove. Flip-out side visors provide extra shade protection for kids when the car is in motion and the sunlight's coming from multiple directions. Built with premium and deluxe fabric and materials, the Comfort Cabin Seat offers extra padding to keep your child comfortable on a long ride.

Large UPF 50+ protection canopy with added side shields 5 position canopy with side shields accomodates growing child 5 position, zero radius recline with flip out foot Height adjustable headrest with no-rethread harness
No-twist harness indicators 2 cup holders Removable inserts

Cover Me 4-in-1 Convertible Car Seat Recommended weight 4-100 lb Recline Front/rear-facing zero recline radius base and rear-facing recline flip foot Cup holder 2 cup holders Comfort Cabin: deluxe fabrics w/ premium padding, and head/body inserts ✔️ Fits three across in most vehicles ✔️ No-twist harness indicator ✔️ Bubble level angle indicator ✔️ UPF 50+ protected canopy with height and angle adjustability and independent flip out visors ✔️ No-rethread harness (Easy headrest adjustment) ✔️ Converts to a belt positioning booster ✔️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect For Sunnier Climates
reviews.reviewText: Perfect - it's pretty lightweight and the canopy keeps the sun out of my LO's eye's perfectly!Not sure why the cup holders are square, but not a deal breaker. Great carseat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars How to make adjustments
reviews.reviewText: The seller should provide a video on how to make attachment or adjustments to the car seat. Had to dig up video on You Tube which wasn’t my exact car seat. Instruction book is lousy. I’m a grandma, not a mom, so I am not up on the new carseats

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This car seat I feel is definitely a safe one for child protection, but the attachment for snapping your child in and out of the seat is difficult to lock and unlock. Also it takes up some much space, so you might want to install in the middle of the backseat rather than behind a seat. Otherwise, you are having to pull the front seat up where it might not be comfortable for the passenger or driver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Difficult straps, rocky seat
reviews.reviewText: The straps for both baby and to secure the seat to the car are incredibly difficult to tighten. The car seat feels very rocky and not secure even as tight as we can get the car strap. Would not recommend at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Toddler outgrew car seat
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is not great for growing toddlers. The buckleDoes not change positions. My toddler is 26lbs and 33in. I have to constantly block her thighs so the buckle doesnt pinch her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
